CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Independent Bank Group Inc is a bank holding company. It offers services such as checking, savings, term loans, energy finance, equipment finance, regular business savings, wealth management, certificate of deposits, auto loans, personal loans, and other banking services. The bank generates its revenue in the form of net interests.
